text:
e="preserve">Robert S. Molaro (June 29, 1960 – June 15, 2020) was an American politician. He was a Democratic member of both houses of the Illinois General Assembly. In 1993, he was elected to the Illinois Senate. In 2003, he was elected to the Illinois House of Representatives. He retired in 2009. Molaro was born in Chicago.
Molaro died in Chicago from pancreatic cancer on June 15, 2020 at the age of 69.
